entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
